name: Rawhide Drum
description: On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 insanity. Inspirational Drumming! When you perform encourage, all non-deaf survivors are affected.

name: Bandages
description: (flash): Remove up to 2 bleeding tokens from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

name: Whisker Harp
description: On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 survival. (flash): Strum. Roll 1d10. On a result of 6+ discard 1 mood currently in play.

name: Cat Eye Circlet
description: (flash): Reveal the next 3 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

name: Frenzy Drink
description: (flash) Consume: Suffer Frenzy brain trauma. Can be used once per showdown.

name: Blood Sheath
description: Block 1. When Rainbow Katana is left of Blood Sheath, it loses Frail and gains Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt).
